text: New Castle is a city in Henry County, Indiana, 44 miles (71 km) east of Indianapolis, on the Big Blue River. In 1900, 3,406 people lived in the town; in 1910, 9,446; in 1920, 14,458; and in 1940, 16,620. The population was 17,396 in 2020. The city is the county seat of Henry County. New Castle is home to New Castle Fieldhouse, the largest high school gymnasium in the world. == References == ==Other websites== * City of New Castle === News & Media === * The Courier-Times * New Castle Online Category:Cities in Indiana Category:County seats in Indiana
title: New Castle, Indiana
